statements: DELETE FROM social_media_sentiment WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND politician_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
DELETE FROM social_media_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 AND sentiment_text LIKE '%negative%';
DELETE FROM politicians WHERE id = 1 AND party = 'Democratic';
DELETE FROM tweets WHERE sentiment = 'negative' AND posted_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM reactions WHERE post_id = 3 AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM reactions WHERE user_id = 123 AND reaction_type = 'like';
DELETE FROM posts WHERE post_id = 50 AND politician_id = 10;
DELETE FROM tweets WHERE author_id = 10 AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
